channel.title: Helpp me please vps prob
channel.description: I am so mad right now I just wanna throw my computer on the ground I was currently using a trentahost vps and all of a sudden it shuts down on my and says its suspended for overdue payment and it said that I was due to pay sept 9 not today! My source that ive been coding for 2 months! is on that vps and I didn't keep a backup WHAT DO I DO PLEASE!!

item.title: Helpp me please vps prob
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Yeah, we’re not trenta host. It’s not our job to deal with your payment dispute. Sorry, go talk to them.

Read full topic

item.title: Helpp me please vps prob
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Some companies will also charge a fee to recover files. For instance, I had to recently pay a $100 fee to access the server for 6 hours to transfer files.

Read full topic

item.title: Helpp me please vps prob
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Contact the company and see if they will let you connect back to that computer to get your files otherwise you are probably screwed.

Read full topic
